poster: p a t r i o t
title: I need help. Help me remember what this arcade cabinet is called.
body:
It was a two player, top down plane shooter. There were multiple planes to choose form with different characters. If i remember correctly they were kind of anime/japanese looking characters.

The game i remember also had a kind of super move button. I remember one was a big laser thing and another i remember filled the screen with rockets. I live in Australia if that changes anything but i really want to remember this.


Edit: If it wasnt clear enough, Im actually talking about an IRL arcade Cabinet. It was a Vertical scrolling arcade game.

replies.body: Are you sure it wasn't Runescape?

[Youtube - Top 10 MAME Vertical Shmups/Shooters of All-Time! ](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=twe2uKsWxqE)

Maybe it's in there look for yourself.

EDIT: [Best top Down Shooters ](http://retro-sanctuary.com/Top%20Down%20Run%20N%27%20Guns.html)
EDIT: [Ikaruga ](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y92tLTUgOgs)

replies.poster: p a t r i o t
replies.body: wow thanks. I hope its in there. Ive been looking for hours and it killing me :<
I have updated another 2 links check them too.
